data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Darrang, Assam, India.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Darrang, Assam, India
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the county of Darrang.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.section_summary: On average, 196 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Darrang, Assam, India.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, help your children in Darrang, Assam, India find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Spirit, make the Word of God a delight to the people of Darrang, like it was to David.
data.verse: I delight in your decrees; I will not neglect your Word.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Darjee people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Father, please give the church in the county of Darrang prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 10,214 believers in Darrang, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.prayer: Father, give the disciples of the the county of Darrang an urgency of seeing every people and place reached for the gospel.
data.verse: As long as it is day, we must do the works of him who sent me. Night is coming, when no one can work.

location.name: Darrang
location.people_groups_list: Chepang, Assamese (Sikh traditions), Ranabhat, Mahara, Gura
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Chepang (1,000), Assamese (Sikh traditions) (1,100), Ranabhat (12,000), Mahara (4,800), Gura (300)
